title: [Large-Scale] Dialogic English Listening-Speaking Competency Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of fundamental scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Peer collaborative learning environment utilizing science topics, supported by digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners sustain science-related English conversations for 15+ minutes, achieving over 80% accurate vocabulary usage in peer interactions.
Learners express logical opinions through at least three critical question-and-answer sessions during project-based tasks.
Learners produce and present one or more science experiment explanation videos incorporating peer feedback, meeting evaluation criteria averaging 3.5/4 or higher.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
